Text:
I let you slide many times after you caused multiple conflicts in the chat and everyone had a problem with you.  You should of honestly been banned the first time you started shit.

However,  I was a nice guy and kept you around.  Then you stupidly show that you have no respect for the rules when you started advertising another Stern site in the chat room which is one of the major rules that you broke.

Sorry bud...no more strikes left.  Try SFN or something.
